title: Vanessa Bayer | Ivanka Trump Election Texts Revealed; Perdue and Vance Embrace Trump’s Lies: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at aspiring Republican politicians deciding the path to power in their party requires fully embracing Donald Trump and his lies about the 2020 election.

Then, Vanessa Bayer breaks down the similarities between SNL and QVC, talks about telling Lorne Michaels about her childhood leukemia and shares one of her favorite rejected SNL sketches.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
